action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Scott, 

Confirming we have also added this article for you: 
https://unearth-ed.com.au/blog/playford-college-make-the-news/

@heath done adding the new blog, the image is low res tho. Kindly check, thanks!

https://unearth-ed.com.au/blog/playford-college-make-the-news/

@rica please add a new blog article to unearth-ed.com.au: 

Title:
Playford College make the news

Content:
Unearth-Ed school group Playford College from Adelaide had the time of their life on their trip to Canberra recently.

ABC TV Canberra featured them in a news segment highlighting some of the great experiences on offer in Canberra including visiting the picturesque Govt House. They were also fortunate to meet the Governor General and his wife, Mr & Mrs Hurley

The trip also highlighted the impact Covid-19 has had on the Canberra education market, but 2021 is looking fantastic.

Bring it on!

Embed this video: https://youtu.be/J3qjgvY22lE 


Image: 
Attached

Can you freeze the video with one of the images or use the photo already on there

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Tuesday, 15 December 2020 2:42 PM
To: Marketing @ Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au <mailto:marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Playford College - ABC story

Hi Scott,

Sure, we can do that for you.

Do you have any images we add as well?

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wolfiq.com.au/>


On 15 Dec 2020, at 12:28 pm, Marketing @ Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au <mailto:marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>> wrote:

Hi mate, can you please put this up on website as well.

Playford College make the news

Unearth-Ed school group Playford College from Adelaide had the time of their life on their trip to Canberra recently.

ABC TV Canberra featured them in a news segment highlighting some of the great experiences on offer in Canberra including visiting the picturesque Govt House. They were also fortunate to meet the Governor General and his wife, Mr & Mrs Hurley

The trip also highlighted the impact Covid-19 has had on the Canberra education market, but 2021 is looking fantastic.

Bring it on!

Thanks, sl

Subject: Re: Playford College - ABC story

Hi,

Facebook can be a bit weird with videos. Also, ABC took down their video after a week or so. Here is the link to our YouTube video of the ABC coverage https://youtu.be/J3qjgvY22lE <https://youtu.be/J3qjgvY22lE>
Best regards,
Kevin Hung
Teacher

Chris

On 7 Dec 2020, at 3:24 pm, Marketing @ Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au <mailto:marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>> wrote:

﻿
Hi Chris

Hope this email finds you well.

I am trying to track down the ABC TV coverage of your trip to Canberra, do you have a link to it, I would like to put it on our website and Facebook pages.

The link below from Cathy doesn’t work.

I’m also trying to get some coverage in the Adelaide Advertiser about your trip to Canberra, do you have any contacts there?

Thanks Chris

Kind regards
Scott Longmuir
Unearth-Ed


From: Racha Makki <racha.makki@playfordcollege.sa.edu.au <mailto:racha.makki@playfordcollege.sa.edu.au>>

Hope you are both well.

Just hoping I could get a copy of the ABC story. We have a Zoom meeting with all the Canberra attraction this coming Wednesday and was hoping to show the story, with your permission of course.

Our Marketing Manager would also like to post it on our Facebook page.

Have a lovely afternoon.

Kind Regards,
